Introduction

Lee Hyun is a South Korean Singer under Bighit Entertainment. He debuted as a member of co-ed trio 8eight on the 25th of August 2007 and debuted as a soloist on the 9th of September 2009. He is best known for being a power vocalist and member of the now-disbanded duo called HOMME.
